data.title: B Long to Link Annihilation
data.description: Use this simple, but effective Annihilation line up to force Defenders out of the close pocket in Link.

data.title: A Main to Back A Site Grav Net Execute
data.description: When executing the A Site, use this Grav Net line up to disrupt Defenders playing back site. This line up is effective, as it allows you to scale to site while it is falling.
